CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 28, 1946, pg. 15, reads: "Christmas Pageant - McKelvy School adds its name to the list of [illegible] and organizations which prepared special programs for the Christmas holiday season.  Parents and friends attended the celebration at the school as the pupils showed off their dramatic ability. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Children from McKelvy School enacting nativity pageant, with two boys holding shields on left, three children on right holding scrolls with stars of David, and woman seated at piano in foreground with sheet music "Santa Claus is Coming to Town" and "Christmas Carols"
